typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		SourceFileName as string,
		DateInserted as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/bronze/SalesOrderDetail') ~> SalesOrderDetailSilver
SalesOrderDetailSilver window(over(SalesOrderID,
		SalesOrderDetailID),
	desc(DateInserted, true),
	RowVersion = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
Window1 filter(RowVersion==1) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	container: 'syn-fs',
	folderPath: 'delta/silver/SalesOrderDetail',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
